title: Day 346: The Benefits of Being Rebuked
description: Psalm 141:2b–4a,5,8a, Esther 4:13–14, Revelation 3:7–11,14a,15–20. I never enjoy being rebuked by someone else, but over time I have come to see the faithful rebuke of a friend as something of great value  The Scriptures tell us that the right kind of rebuke is an important way in which God cares for us, and in which we can care for each other
